document_data.name: Bevemar
document_data.mainbody: '''Bevemar''' was a [[cleric]] and a member of the [[Shadow Thieves]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Bevemar tolerated no backtalk from those she worked with, let alone those who worked for her.
document_data.Activities: Bevemar worked for both the assassin and the enforcer chapters of the guild in northern [[Amn]]. Sometimes, her work forced her to travel to [[Baldur's Gate]]. Her moniker derived for her habit of removing the tongues of debtors of the Shadow Thieves.
